info.name: SEN API Collection
info.description:
✅ SEN API v2.1.0 - Cultural Heritage Game Backend

**Quick Start:**
1. Login to get token (auto-saved)
2. All authenticated requests use token automatically
3. Use sample bodies provided

**Test Accounts:**
- Admin: admin@sen.com / 123456
- Researcher: tuanpham@sen.com / 123456
- Customer: huong.do@sen.com / 123456

**Base URL:** http://localhost:3000/api

**Last Updated:** December 28, 2025
